CONFIDENTIALDOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENTC(81) 23 COPY NO6 May 1981CABINETo *10 1SUMMARY OF BILLS PROPOSED FOR THE LEGISLATIVEPROGRAMME 19BI-82Note by the Secretary Ol State tor the Home- Department1. My memorandum C(8l) 22 contains recommendations for thelegislative programme for next Suasion. In considering those roCORimt n-dations colleagues may wish to refer to the summaries of individual Billscontained in the attached Annexe's. These Annexes cor respond to the lists ofBills annexed to C(8l) 22.2. For each Bill vary brief details are given Of th purposes of its mainprovisions, its state of readiness, questions affecting handling, and theimplications for public expenditure and manpower. The details are based onnotes contributed by sponsoring Departments and subsequent < o r r espond emand discussion with the Ministers concerned.
